settings.heading: Introduce your brand
settings.text: Introduce your brand, products and vision statement and welcome customers to your store.

settings.heading: Subscribe to our newsletter
settings.newsletter--subheading: A short sentence describing what someone will receive by subscribing

settings.heading: Where can I find @home store?
settings.description:
Its easy to locate our store :)

please click on the link mentioned below.

https://www.at-home.co.in/pages/storelocator

settings.heading: How can I place a bulk order and is there any discount available?
settings.description: You can chat with us by clicking on the chat icon on the right-hand side bottom of your page or you can reach us at connect@at-home.co.in, or call us at 1800-121-1414 for further details.

settings.heading: What are the benefits of registering with @home?
settings.description: When you register with us, we provide with regular updates regarding new product launches, new design arrivals, offers, and discounts.

settings.heading: What do I do if a coupon issued by @home is not working?
settings.description:
Your coupon may not be working because of any of the following reasons:

1. The validity of the coupon may have expired.

2. The coupon may have already been used.

3. The coupon may not be applicable on certain items.

4. The coupon will not work if the Shopping Cart Value is less than the value required for the coupon to be applicable.

5. The coupon may be linked to a different user account. Login to the correct user account for availing it.

6. Only one coupon code can be used atÂ aÂ time.

In case of any assistance required you can chat with us or reach us atÂ connect@at-home.co.in, or call us at 1800-121-1414.

settings.heading: How to create my account on @home?
settings.description:
Its easy to create an account with @home, you can simply Sign Up or login with your social profile.
Setting up your account via Sign Up is as easy as:
Click 'Sign Up' at the top of the page. Enter your name and email address in the box that pops up. Create a password.Click 'Sign Up'.
Login via social profile is as easy as:
Click 'Sign In' at the top of the page. Click 'Sign In' with Facebook. Click 'OK' on the permission dialog box that appears on your Facebook page. @home will use your Facebook details to create your at-home.co.in account.
@home, Letâs make life beautiful!

settings.heading: I forgot my @home login password, what to do next?
settings.description: Â There is a possibility that you must have forgotten your password, the solution is easy. Go to My Account page and click on the Forgot password link. You will be prompted with a window, enter your registered email address. A link to reset your password will automatically be sent to you.

settings.heading: Can I buy from www.at-home.co.in as a guest user or without creating an account?
settings.description: Yes, you can purchase using your social media login or through a guest login. However,if you create an account with us, it will be easier for you to shop with us the next time using your login id (your email address) and password. All your personal information will be automatically retrieved from your account.

settings.heading: How do I change my Personal information?
settings.description: Simply go to the My Account page, login and you can modify your account details there. In case of any help is required please send us an email at connect@at-home.co.in

settings.heading: How do i track the progress of an order?
settings.description:
Once your order has been shipped, you will receive an email and an SMS notification with its details. You can track the shipment by clicking on the link provided in the email.
You can also track your order by visiting www.at-home.co.in and clicking on the 'Track Order' link located in the upper right-hand corner of the website. From there, you can either log in or type in your 'Order Number' to get your tracking.

settings.heading: Can I change my delivery date?
settings.description: Sorry, we do not allow rescheduling of orders through our website. You can contact our helpline for further assistance.

settings.heading: Can I change my mobile number or shipping address?
settings.description: Please get in touch with our Customer Care at connect@at-home.co.in We'll try our best to assist you.

settings.heading: How can I know the availability timelines of a product that is Out of stock?
settings.description: We regularly update our product range with new items, but every once in a while, you may miss out on something. Enter your email address in the Notify Me box next to the product, and you'll be the first to know when it's back in stock.

settings.heading: How and When can I cancel my order?
settings.description: If you change your mind after placing an order, you can cancel the order (or part of the order) within 24 hrs of the order confirmation, or before it is shipped, whichever is earlier.

settings.heading: Can I place a B2B order?
settings.description: Yes, you can. You need to add Business Details during checkout. In case of Bulk orders, the timeline may vary.

settings.heading: How do I check the delivery timelines before I place the order?
settings.description: Enter your delivery pin code on the item page which will guide you through estimated timelines.

settings.heading: Do you deliver to multiple addresses?
settings.description: We only deliver at the specified shipping address mentioned in your order.

settings.heading: How do I know the delivery services are available before I place the order?
settings.description: Enter your delivery pin code on the item page to know whether it can be delivered to your address.

settings.heading: Do you ship internationally?
settings.description: As of now, @home by Nilkamal doesn't ship items outside India. However, @home does allow you to make purchases for your loved ones in India from anywhere in the world by using your international credit or debit cards issued in India. You need to ensure that the Shipping Address is in India

settings.heading: My purchase is a gift, can @Home do a gift wrap and send the order without an invoice?
settings.description: We can consider gift wrapping only for the household range.However, you need to contact us on the same day of purchase. Unfortunately, we cannot ship any product without an invoice. To comply with the rules governing the movement of goods in India, and due to tax and regulatory reasons, all shipments have to be accompanied with an invoice.

settings.heading: Why does the promised Delivery date vary from one item to the other?
settings.description: The delivery time for an item is determined by various factors including the kind of product (standard product or made, to-order), the location from where the item is procured, and logistic network available at your location. Hence, the delivery dates may vary from one item to the other.

settings.heading: Are there any shipping/delivery charges?
settings.description: We offer FREE SHIPPING for our furniture range however shipping charges are applicable on ODA(outside delivery area) pin codes. The household range can be purchased with nominal shipping charges (Rs.99/-) for orders below Rs.1000/-

settings.heading: When will my product assembly happen? Do I need to contact anyone?
settings.description: Once the order is delivered, sit back and relax. Our Installation partner will get in touch with you and assembly will happen in 3 to 5 business days post-delivery.

settings.heading: What are my payment options?
settings.description:
@home offers a wide range of payment options to accommodate every need and offer maximum flexibility. The following payment options are currently available on @home:

1. Cash on Delivery

2. Debit Card

3. Credit Card

4. Net Banking

5. EMI

6. UPI

7. Wallets (Paytm, MobiKwik, Freecharge, Jio Money, ICash Card, ICICI Pockets, Itz Cash Card, Oxygen, PayCash Card, The Mobile Wallet, Vodafone M â Pesa, XPay, Yes Bank)

settings.heading: What are the EMI options available?
settings.description: @home offers you an EMI facility. You can check on the product page the exact EMI amount for the product you wish to purchase.

settings.heading: Does @home retain my card or account details?
settings.description: We do not collect or store your card or account details. Your transaction is authorized at multiple points, first by the payment gateway and subsequently by Visa/MasterCard/Banks directly without any information passing through us.

settings.heading: What should I do if a transaction fails?
settings.description:
Transactions could fail due to multiple reasons:

Information passed on to the payment gateway is inaccurate, i.e., account details, billing address, and password (for net banking).

Your Internet connection is disrupted in the process.

If your account has been debited after a payment failure, it will be rolled back within seven working days.

Please direct all questions and further clarifications regarding the above statement to connect@at-home.co.in.

settings.heading: Can I place a COD Order?
settings.description: Yes! You can place a COD order of up to Rs.5000/-.

settings.heading: Can I add my GST details to the TAX invoice?
settings.description: Currently, we are accepting only B2C orders.Hence, we would not be able to add GST details to the tax invoice.

settings.heading: Can I return my order?
settings.description:
We offer a 14-Day Return Policy for all products.
Returns are accepted only for the following reasons:

Damaged Product

Manufacturing Defect

Incomplete Product

Incorrect Product

The time frame starts from the date the product was delivered as per the confirmation received from our logistics team or courier partners.
Please send us 2 images (one of damaged part and one of the entire product) of the product to ascertain the reason for return which can be initiated from the "contact us" Section or you can send us an email to connect@at-home.co.in or you can call us on 1800-121-1414
We offer hassle-free returns through courier pickup or you can also request a replacement for the non furniture products online or at any of our stores. You do not have to bear any courier or shipping charges for returns.
All products bought online can only be returned in case of manufacturing defects or damaged product delivery or incorrect or incomplete. This needs to be brought to our notice (via phone / email / whatsapp) within 48 hours from the delivery / assembly date. To return furniture, you can reach us at connect@at-home.co.in, or call us on 1800-121-1414

settings.heading: When will I get the refund?
settings.description:
Any refund against a return request made to @home customer support and collected by courier shall be processed only upon receipt of the merchandise in unused condition along with the original invoice.
After the merchandise is received and verified by @home we shall process a refund/replacement within 1-2 weeks of receipt of the merchandise.For remote locations or Tier 2/Tier 3 cities we may take additional time to process replacement request.

Refunds to the Cardholderâs credit card/debit card will only be credited back to his/her account which was used Refunds to the Cardholderâs credit card/debit card will only be credited back to his/her account which was used.
In case of COD order, Refund will be issued through cheque payment mode. Customer needs to send details that are required for cheque draft. COD refund is manual process hence it takes maximum 7-8 days to process cheque request. We recommend to opt for prepaid payment mode while placing an order for faster refund.


Please call at Toll Free # 1-800-121-1414 (10.00am-7.00pm IST; 6 days a week), email to connect@at-home.co.in for any queries or concerns about our returns and exchange policy.

settings.heading: What warranty does @home have for its products?
settings.description: The warranty that we offer differs from product to product, based on the materials used. Please refer to the 'Specifications' tab in the Product Details section for warranty related information

settings.heading: Can I return a product in case I do not want it or do not like it?
settings.description: Item cannot be refunded for any reasons other than following: Damage / dead on arrival, Manufacturing defect/Expired product & In-correct product.

settings.heading: Privacy Policy:Â
settings.description:
What information we collect?
When you create an account withÂ www.at-home.co.in, we may collect a variety of personal information including your name, mailing address, phone number and email address. WeÂ will automatically store this information for our record.Â 

Why we collect your information?
You may be asked to provide your personal information anytime you are in contact withÂ www.at-home.co.in.Â  We may use the information to provide and improve our products, services, content and advertising.Â 

How we use your information

The personal information that weÂ collect allows us to keep you posted onÂ our latest product, announcements and upcoming events.Â 

It also helps us to develop, deliver and improve our products, services, content and advertising.Â 

When we disclose your information?
www.at-home.co.inÂ does not disclose your personal information to unaffiliated third parties, or to our affiliates, who may want to offer you their own products and services unless you have requested or authorizedÂ us to do so.Â 

We may disclose information about you to protect you against fraud andÂ other crimes.Â 

Integrity of your personal information
www.at-home.co.inÂ makes it easy for you to keep your personal information accurate, complete, and up to date. We will retain your personal information for the period necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy unless a longer retention period is required.Â

settings.heading: Security Policy:Â
settings.description:
What are cookies and how @home uses them?
A cookie is a small file created by website to store information on a personal computer and which it can later retrieve.Â 

We may use cookies for some administrative purposes, i.e. to store our customerâs preferences for certain kinds of products or to store a password so that you do not have to input it every time you visit our website.Â 

If you are uncomfortable with the use of cookies technology, you can change your cookies preferences so that your browser doesnât accept cookies or accepts them only from limited sources.Â 

Refer the Help section of your browser on how to enable or disable cookies.Â 

Saving items and carts for later
You can build a cart with the items you would like to purchase, and save it for later. Save as many carts as you like, and share them via email with a friend or colleague.Â 

You can save an item after adding it to your cart, by clicking the âAdd to Cartâ button. In the âYour Shopping Cartâ section, simply click âSave Cartâ button.Â 

Your Saved Cart will be sent to your mail as you needed to provide your email address. You can access the Saved Cart list via your email.Â 

Secure Socket Layer â Protect Online Order InformationÂ 

www.at-home.co.inÂ uses Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) encryption on all web pages where personal information is collected. To make purchases from this service, you must use an SSL-enabled browser such as Safari, Firefox, or Internet Explorer. Doing so protects the confidentiality of your personal information while itâs transmitted over the Internet.Â 

âWe are using TechProcess Solutions Limited Payment Gateway which is certified by âVeriSign Securedâ and âPayment Card Industry Data Security Standards (PCI-DSS)â authorities.Â 

Links to third party sites
www.at-home.co.inÂ Â may have links to third party sites. We are not responsible for any information collected by those third parties as it is not governed by us. It is advisable for you to learn the privacy policy of those third parties.Â 

Changes to Security and Privacy Policy
www.at-home.co.inÂ Â from time to time may modify or change this policy at any time with or without notice. We encourage you to refer to this policy periodically for any changes made.
